archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.1b: b) identifying information security incidents (e.g. receiving information security incident reports, assessment of business impact, categorisation and classification of the information security incident, and recording of information about the information security incident)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
